comments.comments_text: Chris Kavanagh shows a yellow card to Nampalys Mendy (Leicester) for his blatant foul.

comments.comments_text: Joao Moutinho sends a precise lofted cross into the box. Diogo Jota (Wolves) latches on to it and finishes with a quick shot into the middle of the goal. The goalkeeper had no chance. The score changes to 1:0.

comments.comments_text: An amazing individual effort from Demarai Gray (Leicester) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball precisely into the bottom left corner and makes it 2:1. Rui Patricio was helpless.

comments.comments_text: The manager has been forced to make a substitution and the injured Harry Maguire limps off the pitch to be replaced by Jonny Evans (Leicester).

comments.comments_text: Demarai Gray (Leicester) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.

comments.comments_text: Here is an example of luck not being on your side. Conor Coady (Wolves) puts the ball into the back of the net but, unfortunately for him, it's into his own goal!

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester) was quite harsh and Chris Kavanagh didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Great play by Ruben Neves releases Diogo Jota (Wolves) in space on the edge of the box. He spots the keeper off his line and coolly puts the ball low in the bottom of the net. 3:2.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Wes Morgan (Leicester) rises high inside the six-yard box to meet a cross by James Maddison from the free kick. He heads home into the middle of the goal, making the score 3:3.

comments.comments_text: Diogo Jota (Wolves) gets to the ball on the edge of the box and fires in a first-time shot without any hesitation. The strike is excellent and goes straight into the bottom left corner. He couldn't have done it any better. 4:3.
